import React, { Component, Fragment, useState } from "react"; import { Button, Card, CardHeader, CardBody, FormGroup, Form, Input, Row, Col } from "reactstrap"; import {graphql} from 'react-apollo'; // import gql from "graphql-tag"; import { Mutation } from "react-apollo"; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import queries from 'queries/Empresas.jsx'; import { ToastProvider, useToasts } from 'react-toast-notifications' class Formuser extends React.Component { state = { nombre: '', usuario: '', correo: '', provincia: '', canton: '', distrito: '', } Toast=()=>{ const { addToast } = useToasts(); addToast('Saved Successfully', { appearance: 'success' }) const {nombre,usuario,correo, provincia, canton, distrito} = this.state return (
this.setState({ nombre: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ correo: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ usuario: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ provincia: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ canton: e.target.value })} /> this.setState({ distrito: e.target.value })} /> {postEmpresa=> }
) } render() { return ( <>
Registro de empresas
 ); } } export default graphql(queries.addEmpresas)(Formuser); // export default Formuser; // mutation onCompleted={() => this.props.history.push('/')}
